title: 20' Ceilings - 2 bed+Loft/2.5 bath -- 1,289 Sq Ft
posting_body: ['Bright condo with 20+ foot ceilings.', 'Lower level has two bedrooms with full private bathroom inside each.', 'Primary bedroom has direct access slider to large private concrete patio.', 'A spacious loft and half bath are on 2nd and 3rd floor.', 'Washer, dryer, refrigerator and dishwasher included.', 'Pet friendly.', 'Walk (0.6 miles) to everything NoHo West has to offer & just minutes to Metro line.', 'Two car side by side gated underground parking.', '***Must call/text to schedule viewing prior to receiving application instructions.', '*', '**', 'IMPORTANT INFO:', '***Must call/text to schedule viewing prior to receiving application instructions.', '*', '**', 'No evictions', '12 Month lease', 'Rental History & Employment Verification', 'You must show VERIFIABLE income equal to approx.', '2.5x’s the monthly rent', 'Application fee is $50 per applicant (non-refundable)', 'Holding deposit required $350', 'Security deposit $2900 OAC', 'Water & Trash included in rent', 'Renters insurance required', 'Cats & Dogs welcome with additional deposit of $500.', 'Monthly pet rent per pet.']
